basics.name: Shengzhe Feng
basics.label: Fresh Graduate
basics.summary: I am a fresh postgraduate with a major of Business Analytics. I have 1 year working experience as a data analyst in commercial bank and few month of entrepreneurial experience. Now I am about to restart my new career as a business analyst.

highlights: Use RFM and clustering models for customer segmentation and labelling customers
Calculate the customers' return visit rate and define churn rate of oral medical industry
Apply Markov Chain to analyse the patient journey and find the value of each section office
Responsible for the ETL of data warehouse and business reports generation
Building decision-making systems such as Fund Transfer Pricing System
Record the condition of the exhibits, such as the humidity and temperature
Introduce visitors about different exhibition areas and provide a rough knowledge of the exhibits
Assist the museum to hold Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn copperplate exhibition

awards.title: School of Management MSc Scholarship
awards.awarder: Professor Ian H White - Vice Chancellor of Bath
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
